amendment.description: To allow State Homeland Security Program grant funds to be used to pay costs associated with the attendance of part-time and volunteer first responders at terrorism response courses approved by the Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3647 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3647 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S9208-9209; text: CR S9209) To allow State Homeland Security Program grant funds to be used to pay costs associated with the attendance of part-time and volunteer first responders at terrorism response courses approved by the Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3647 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
